headline: Why Union Pacific Stock Is Sidetracked Today
summary: The confusion continues to weigh on shares of Union Pacific (NYSE: UNP), with the railroad stock opening down 4% and continuing to be down 1% as of 3 p.m. ET.  Union Pacific is one of two primary railroads serving the U.S. West Coast.  Its route network includes extensive access to major Pacific Ocean ports, making the railroad one of the primary conduits for goods imported from Asia to be distributed nationwide.
